attributes.action: give funding to those war veterans wishing to attend the 65th d-day anniversary in Normandy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "give funding to those war veterans wishing to attend the 65th d-day anniversary in Normandy."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20695


Prime Minister's Office
